javadoc:
An table column that knows how to generate ProgramLocation objects for a give row type.
@see AbstractProgramBasedDynamicTableColumn

methods.name: getProgramLocation
methods.comment:
Determines an appropriate program location associated with this field for the indicated row object.
 The most probable use is for navigating from the field.

params.name: rowObject
params.comment: the object associated with the table row.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program associated with the table.

params.name: serviceProvider
params.comment: the plugin tool associated with the table.

return.comment: the address associated with the field.

name: ProgramLocationTableColumn
comment: An table column that knows how to generate ProgramLocation objects for a give row type.
